archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Develop & Deliver quarterly/annual/multi year resource business plans
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Develop and deliver quarterly, annual and multi-year resource plans, negotiations, approvals , resource development and management

properties.value: Develop & Deliver quarterly /annual/multi year resource business plans focus on developing and delivering quarterly, annual and multi-year resource plans in support of services, products and offers that include volume forecasts, negotiation for required levels of resources and budgets, gaining resource development and management as well as supply chain commitment and executive approval for the plans.
